name: Warfist BattleBots game template
description:
PRESS Q TO PLAY IN FULLSCREEN IT FIXES A FEW BUGS!!!

Warfist BattleBots is a free action platformer template that can be edited  without u needing to code using gdevelop 5. I am no longer working on this project because I found it boring and unfun but now u can use this as a template and make a less boring and unfun game

Features:

  • Boss AI
  • Basic Enemies
  • Moving Platforms
  • Mobile Controls/support
  • And more...

Instructions:

WASD/arrow keys to move

left mouse click or z to shoot

Update: Fixed some stuff with the web port. for those wondering how I added custom text to the load screen I edited some of the javascript files for the web port.
